stories.original_headline: Next gen cancer drug shows surprising anti aging power
stories.original_summary: A next-generation drug tested in yeast was found to extend lifespan and slow aging by influencing a major growth-control pathway. stories.fantasy_headline: New Elixir of Life Discovered by Alchemists!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild brewed a new potion, first tested on simple magical fungi. It wonderfully extended their years and slowed the creeping signs of age. Wizards also learned of tiny sprites that help balance one's vital energy, influenced by daily fare and inner spirits.

stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Foods Hold Key to a Stronger Heart!
stories.fantasy_story: Scholars of Nature have revealed that eating certain brews, sweet fruits, crunchy seeds, and hardy grains can keep your heart strong. After many years of observation on over three thousand villagers, those who partook of these enchanted bounties showed healthier vital humors and inner oils.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Scribes Prepare New Oracle Scroll Amidst Rivalry!
stories.fantasy_story: Master Scribe Altman of the Grand Scribes' Guild has declared a time of urgency, urging his scribes and enchantresses to speed their work. They must swiftly respond to the growing rivalry from the Whispering Tomes Syndicate. A new incantation of the Oracle Scroll, Fifth-Level, is to be unveiled soon, matching the Twin-Vision Tome.

stories.fantasy_headline: Chronicle of Knowledge Reveals Personal Year's Wonders!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Chronicle of All Knowledge, a vast library of enchanted scrolls, will now show each user their own Personalized Scroll of Yearly Reflections.
